Shucky's Sweets

Here you will find our pricing list!

Cake prices with sizes

    Cakes

  • 4" Round-$20.00 (serves 1-4 people-smash cake size)
  • 6" Round-$20.00 (serves 8-12 people)
  • 8" Round-$20.00 (serves 16-26 people)
  • 10" Round-$20.00 (serves 26-42 people)
  • 12" Round-$20.00 (serves 28-56 people)
  • 9"x13" Quarter Sheet-$70.00 (serves 24-40 people)

    • Tiered Cakes

  • 2 Tier (4" & 6"round)-$55.00 (serves 10-16 people)
  • 2 Tier (4" & 8"round)-$85.00 (serves 28-32 people)
  • 2 Tier (6" & 8"round)-$105.00 (serves 24-38 people)
  • 2 Tier (8" & 10"round)-$135.00 (serves 42-68 people)
  • 2 Tier (10" & 12"round)-$230.00 (serves 54-98 people)
  • 3 Tier(4" & 6"round)-$125.00 (serves 28-42 people)
  • 3 Tier(4" & 6"round)-$195.00 (serves 50-80 people)
  • 3 Tier(4" & 6"round)-$295.00 (serves 70-124 people)
  • 4 Tier(4" & 6"round)-$325.00***(serves 78-136 people)
    • *** 4 Tier cakes will require 'Set-up & Delivery' Fee as described below; in order to be fnished being built onsite- due to their size. Delivery & Set Up Fees: Available upon request, unless needed for a '4 tier cake'. The prices are as follows; a flat fee of $50.00 + $1.00 PER mile to/from my location to your destination would apply.

  • Vegan Cakes-Additional $10.00 to the "Basic" cake lists above. For more information on Vegan cakes please see the "Learn More page".
  • Ganache "Drip" Effect-Additional $5.00 per tier. Available in Caramel, Peanut Butter, Milk Chocolate, Dark Chocolate, White or Colored Chocolate.

    • Dog-Friendly Cakes

  • The Buster Cake- $20.00 each. Dog-friendly cake! 4" personal sized cake specially made for your favorite 4-legged friend! Made with all dog-friendly ingredients; pumpkin and peanut butter flavor.

    • Sugar Cookies

    $2.50 Each- One dozen minimum required.

    My sugar cookies are a vanilla-almond flavor profile. They stay nice and soft and the icing is more of a glaze instead of traditional crunchy royal icing. I do not stack the cookies and prefer to not individually wrap them due to their soft nature. Cookies can be very time consuming to decorate; so a two week advanced notice is recommended and subjected to availabiility based upon schedule and season. **Additional fee may apply, based upon design of cookies.


    Also available are Cookie Cakes!
  • 12"round Chocolate Chip Cookie Cake-$40.00
  • 12"round Oatmeal Cookie Cake-$30.00


    • Cupcakes

  • Standard Size & Basic cake flavor- $2.00 each / Premium cake flavor- $2.50 each
  • ** Standard size cupcakes are a 1 dozen minimum order!
  • Mini Size & Basic cake flavor- $1.00 each / Premium cake flavor- $1.25 each
  • ** Mini sizes are a 2 dozen minimum order!
  • Cupcake "Cake"-$3.00 each and additional fees may apply based upon deisgn.
  • Regular Cupcakes are always baked in batches of a dozen and Minis are baked in batches of 2 dozen. If ordering more than one dozen; you may choose different flavors at no additional cost.

    • Extra Sweet Treats;

  • Brownies (individually wrapped)-$1.75 each and 1 dozen minimum required.
  • Chocolate Covered Pretzel Rods (individually wrapped)-$1.50 each and 1 dozen minimum required.
  • Chocolate Covered Rice Krispy Treats- $2.50 each and 1 dozen minimum required.
  • Peanut Butter Buckeyes- $1.00 each and 1 dozen minimum required.

Have your cake and eat it too!
